constructRepositoryFullPath

public java.lang.String constructRepositoryFullPath(java.lang.String type,
                                                    org.apache.maven.project.Project project,
                                                    java.lang.String version)
                                             throws org.apache.maven.MavenException
Map an nar artifact to a repository path. Repository path is formatted like: artifactId-nar-version[.subtype].nar where subtype is equal to the string following nar. in type.

Specified by:
constructRepositoryFullPath in interface org.apache.maven.repository.ArtifactTypeHandler
Parameters:
project - the project for the artifact
type - The type of the artifact, optionally followed by -subtype.
version - The version of the artifact (may be a snapshot)
Returns:
the path
Throws:
org.apache.maven.MavenException
